reviews.text: Probably one of my favorite places in Columbus. Staff was fantastic. Really accommodating. Food was good. Atmosphere was great. We loved sitting in the...

TL;DR: Avoid for large groups and don't expect a true "reservation."

I'd never been to Columbus before but was in town for a conference. I saw this place...
Delicious food, friendly service, chill atmosphere at the bar. Philly was so good! Everything was very fresh. Really enjoyed the cherry pepper aioli sauce!
